title: Beige Dabu Print Cotton Flared Shorts
description:
Craft: Dabu Hand-Lep Print
Primary Fabric: 100% Cotton - Natural Dyed, Hand Lep-ed in Bagru (Rajasthan)
This garment is Hand Embroidered
Pattern: Solid, Contemporary
Color: Beige
Style: Flared
Length: Mid-Thigh Length
High Rise waist
Full Elasticated Waist
This garment has Slash Pocket, Rounded Pocket
Number of Pockets: 2
Garment Transparency: Opaque
Relaxed Fit
Wash delicately by hand, or in the most gentle machine cycle.
Iron on reverse. Line dry in the shade.
Do not dry clean, bleach, wring, tumble dry or iron on embellishments.
Natural colors tend to bleed. Wash them separately with less washing agent.
